entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 12.
